Articles.Content:
Hi.

I went away and I am back again. Relearning what I used to know.

Memory is the first thing to go they say.

 

Could we have an extra line in the "Right Click Menu" (For lack of a better name) of parts?

Maybe call it "Action Grouping". And it would display what buttons makes it work.

Example:

I am about to do some atmospheric braking and I go: What is the grouping button for those 12 antennas and solar panels?

Going to the VAB to check is a bit of a bore.

 

Thank you. So far I like 1.3.1 very much.

 

ME

Action groups extended is your friend.

Or maybe it's action groups everywhere, I'm not sure which it is

Action Group Manager is my mod of choice.  Yes, it should be stock.  

Edited October 31, 2017 by klgraham1013

I used masking tape and a sharpy but also came up with my own standard keys for common AGs:

  1. primary engine toggle
  2. secondary engine toggle
  3. engine mode toggle
  4. chutes
  5. coms toggle
  6. panels toggle
  7. cargo bay toggle
  8. cargo release
  9. docking release
  10. retract/close all
What I want to see is custom groupings on the throttle, pitch, roll, and yaw keys.

I agree.  A 'view action groups' hotkey and/or on the right click menu would be a jolly handy.

Actually the ability to edit or create action groups in flight would also be very welcome.
